microprocessor.name: SRC-TCP [System] Display Controller v1.3
microprocessor.description: Manages all screen interfaces so they can be displayed on one screen

node.label: Exterior Lighting UI
node.description: Touch data to Exterior Lighting Interface UI

node.label: Interior Lighting UI
node.description: Touch data to Interior Lighting Interface UI

node.label: Decouple UI
node.description: Touch data to Decouple Interface UI

node.label: Door UI
node.description: Touch data to Door Interface UI

object.script:
colors={w={85,90,90},w2={70,75,75},b={10,10,10},b2={8,8,8},acc={69,12,10}} m={"ExtLight","Decouple","IntLight","Door","-","-","-","-"} im={} menu=true scr=0
function touch(x,y,w,h) return t.x>=x and t.y>=y and t.x<x+w and t.y<y+h end function onTouch(x,y,w,h) return touch(x,y,w,h) and press end function onRelease(x,y,w,h) return touch(x,y,w,h) and pre and not press end function onPress(x,y,w,h) return touch(x,y,w,h) and press and not pre end
function setC(v) sC(v[1],v[2],v[3]) end
gN=input.getNumber;gB=input.getBool;sN=output.setNumber;sB=output.setBool; function onTick() press=gB(1) and not sts night=gB(3) d={w=gN(1),h=gN(2)} t={x=gN(3),y=gN(4)}
sts = d.w<64 or d.h<64
if night then theme={bg=colors.b,bg2=colors.b2,fg=colors.w,acc=colors.acc} else theme={bg=colors.w,bg2=colors.w2,fg=colors.b,acc=colors.acc} end
for i=1,#m,1 do im[i]=gB(i+3) end fit,max = cScr(d.h)
-- scroll sUp=scr>0 or pUp sDown=scr<max or pDown if max>0 and menu then if onPress(d.w-9,d.h-24,9,8) and scr>0 then scr=scr-1 end if onPress(d.w-9,d.h-15,9,8) and scr<max then scr=scr+1 end end scr=clamp(scr,0,max)
if menu then
-- modules y=24 x=6 c=0 for i=1,#m,1 do if im[i] then if c>=scr and c<fit+scr then if onRelease(x,y,44,9) then menu=false sN(1,i) end y=y+12 end c=c+1 end end else
-- back button if onRelease(0,0,9,9) then menu=true sN(1,0) end end
if sts then menu=true sN(1,0) end
pre=gB(1) and not sts end
function dDot(x,y) dRF(x,y,1,1) end
function dOpt(x,y,w,h,t,tog) setC(theme.fg) if tog then setC(theme.acc) dRF(x,y,w,h) setC(theme.bg2) end dTB(x+3,y,w,h,t,-1,0) setC(theme.acc) dL(x,y,x,y+9) end
function dLogo(x,y) dL(x,y,x+3,y) dL(x+1,y+1,x+1,y+5) dL(x+4,y,x+4,y+5) dL(x+5,y,x+7,y) dL(x+5,y+4,x+7,y+4) dR(x+8,y,2,2) dL(x+8,y+3,x+8,y+5) end
s=screen;sC=s.setColor;dTF=s.drawTriangleF;dR=s.drawRect;dRF=s.drawRectF;dT=s.drawText;dTB=s.drawTextBox;dL=s.drawLine; function onDraw() w=s.getWidth() h=s.getHeight()
if menu then setC(theme.bg2) s.drawClear() end
-- bar setC(theme.bg) dRF(0,0,w,9)
lFit,lMax = cScr(h) lScr = clamp(scr,0,lMax)
if menu then
-- scroll if lMax>0 then setC(sUp and (onTouch(d.w-9,d.h-24,9,8) and theme.acc or theme.fg) or theme.bg) dL(w-5,h-22, w-8,h-19) dL(w-5,h-21, w-8,h-18) dL(w-5,h-22, w-2,h-19) dL(w-5,h-21, w-2,h-18) setC(sDown and (onTouch(d.w-9,d.h-15,9,8) and theme.acc or theme.fg) or theme.bg) dL(w-5,h-10, w-8,h-13) dL(w-5,h-11, w-8,h-14) dL(w-5,h-10, w-2,h-13) dL(w-5,h-11, w-2,h-14) setC(theme.fg) if lScr > 0 then dDot(9,20) dDot(11,20) dDot(13,20) end if lScr < lMax then dDot(9,h-4) dDot(11,h-4) dDot(13,h-4) end pUp = onTouch(d.w-9,d.h-24,9,8) and sUp pDown = onTouch(d.w-9,d.h-15,9,8) and sDown end
-- modules y=24 yt=24 x=6 c=0 for i=1,#m,1 do if im[i] then if c>=lScr and c<lFit+lScr then main=c>=scr and c<fit+scr dOpt(x,y,44,9,m[i],onTouch(x,yt,44,9) and main) y=y+12 if main then yt=yt+12 end end c=c+1 end end else -- back button setC(theme.fg) if onTouch(0,0,9,9) then setC(theme.acc) dRF(0,0,9,9) setC(theme.bg) end dL(3,4,6,1) dL(3,4,6,7) dL(4,4,7,1) dL(4,4,7,7) setC(theme.acc) dL(0,0,0,9) end
if w<64 or h<64 then dSTS() end
setC(theme.fg) dLogo(w-13,2) end
function clamp(a,b,c)return math.min(math.max(a,b),c)end;function cScr(d)local e=math.floor((d-28)/12)local f=-e;for g=1,#m,1 do if im[g]then f=f+1 end end;return e,f end;function dSTS()w2=w/2;setC(theme.bg2)dRF(0,9,w,h-9)setC(theme.fg)dR(w2-6,16,11,7)dL(w2+2,22,w2+5,22)setC(theme.acc)dRF(w2-10,12,3,3)dRF(w2+7,12,3,3)dRF(w2-10,25,3,3)dRF(w2+7,25,3,3)setC(theme.bg2)dRF(w2-10,12,2,2)dRF(w2+8,12,2,2)dRF(w2-10,26,2,2)dRF(w2+8,26,2,2)end

c0.script:
colors={w={85,90,90},w2={70,75,75},b={10,10,10},b2={8,8,8},acc={69,12,10}} m={"ExtLight","Decouple","IntLight","Door","-","-","-","-"} im={} menu=true scr=0
function touch(x,y,w,h) return t.x>=x and t.y>=y and t.x<x+w and t.y<y+h end function onTouch(x,y,w,h) return touch(x,y,w,h) and press end function onRelease(x,y,w,h) return touch(x,y,w,h) and pre and not press end function onPress(x,y,w,h) return touch(x,y,w,h) and press and not pre end
function setC(v) sC(v[1],v[2],v[3]) end
gN=input.getNumber;gB=input.getBool;sN=output.setNumber;sB=output.setBool; function onTick() press=gB(1) and not sts night=gB(3) d={w=gN(1),h=gN(2)} t={x=gN(3),y=gN(4)}
sts = d.w<64 or d.h<64
if night then theme={bg=colors.b,bg2=colors.b2,fg=colors.w,acc=colors.acc} else theme={bg=colors.w,bg2=colors.w2,fg=colors.b,acc=colors.acc} end
for i=1,#m,1 do im[i]=gB(i+3) end fit,max = cScr(d.h)
-- scroll sUp=scr>0 or pUp sDown=scr<max or pDown if max>0 and menu then if onPress(d.w-9,d.h-24,9,8) and scr>0 then scr=scr-1 end if onPress(d.w-9,d.h-15,9,8) and scr<max then scr=scr+1 end end scr=clamp(scr,0,max)
if menu then
-- modules y=24 x=6 c=0 for i=1,#m,1 do if im[i] then if c>=scr and c<fit+scr then if onRelease(x,y,44,9) then menu=false sN(1,i) end y=y+12 end c=c+1 end end else
-- back button if onRelease(0,0,9,9) then menu=true sN(1,0) end end
if sts then menu=true sN(1,0) end
pre=gB(1) and not sts end
function dDot(x,y) dRF(x,y,1,1) end
function dOpt(x,y,w,h,t,tog) setC(theme.fg) if tog then setC(theme.acc) dRF(x,y,w,h) setC(theme.bg2) end dTB(x+3,y,w,h,t,-1,0) setC(theme.acc) dL(x,y,x,y+9) end
function dLogo(x,y) dL(x,y,x+3,y) dL(x+1,y+1,x+1,y+5) dL(x+4,y,x+4,y+5) dL(x+5,y,x+7,y) dL(x+5,y+4,x+7,y+4) dR(x+8,y,2,2) dL(x+8,y+3,x+8,y+5) end
s=screen;sC=s.setColor;dTF=s.drawTriangleF;dR=s.drawRect;dRF=s.drawRectF;dT=s.drawText;dTB=s.drawTextBox;dL=s.drawLine; function onDraw() w=s.getWidth() h=s.getHeight()
if menu then setC(theme.bg2) s.drawClear() end
-- bar setC(theme.bg) dRF(0,0,w,9)
lFit,lMax = cScr(h) lScr = clamp(scr,0,lMax)
if menu then
-- scroll if lMax>0 then setC(sUp and (onTouch(d.w-9,d.h-24,9,8) and theme.acc or theme.fg) or theme.bg) dL(w-5,h-22, w-8,h-19) dL(w-5,h-21, w-8,h-18) dL(w-5,h-22, w-2,h-19) dL(w-5,h-21, w-2,h-18) setC(sDown and (onTouch(d.w-9,d.h-15,9,8) and theme.acc or theme.fg) or theme.bg) dL(w-5,h-10, w-8,h-13) dL(w-5,h-11, w-8,h-14) dL(w-5,h-10, w-2,h-13) dL(w-5,h-11, w-2,h-14) setC(theme.fg) if lScr > 0 then dDot(9,20) dDot(11,20) dDot(13,20) end if lScr < lMax then dDot(9,h-4) dDot(11,h-4) dDot(13,h-4) end pUp = onTouch(d.w-9,d.h-24,9,8) and sUp pDown = onTouch(d.w-9,d.h-15,9,8) and sDown end
-- modules y=24 yt=24 x=6 c=0 for i=1,#m,1 do if im[i] then if c>=lScr and c<lFit+lScr then main=c>=scr and c<fit+scr dOpt(x,y,44,9,m[i],onTouch(x,yt,44,9) and main) y=y+12 if main then yt=yt+12 end end c=c+1 end end else -- back button setC(theme.fg) if onTouch(0,0,9,9) then setC(theme.acc) dRF(0,0,9,9) setC(theme.bg) end dL(3,4,6,1) dL(3,4,6,7) dL(4,4,7,1) dL(4,4,7,7) setC(theme.acc) dL(0,0,0,9) end
if w<64 or h<64 then dSTS() end
setC(theme.fg) dLogo(w-13,2) end
function clamp(a,b,c)return math.min(math.max(a,b),c)end;function cScr(d)local e=math.floor((d-28)/12)local f=-e;for g=1,#m,1 do if im[g]then f=f+1 end end;return e,f end;function dSTS()w2=w/2;setC(theme.bg2)dRF(0,9,w,h-9)setC(theme.fg)dR(w2-6,16,11,7)dL(w2+2,22,w2+5,22)setC(theme.acc)dRF(w2-10,12,3,3)dRF(w2+7,12,3,3)dRF(w2-10,25,3,3)dRF(w2+7,25,3,3)setC(theme.bg2)dRF(w2-10,12,2,2)dRF(w2+8,12,2,2)dRF(w2-10,26,2,2)dRF(w2+8,26,2,2)end
